title: 5 Once-Sleepy Dividend Utility Companies Are Striking Massive Deals With Big Tech
full_text: 5 Once-Sleepy Dividend Utility Companies Are Striking Massive Deals With Big Tech. What could be a better avenue than utility stocks that pay dependable, often large, dividend payments every quarter? These five stocks could be perfect for.... The companys portfolio comprises hydroelectric, wind, solar, and storage facilities across North America, South America, Europe, and Asia. It has approximately 33,000 megawatts of installed capacity … [+7787 chars]
